__e: Our dispatcher said there was this hooker and three men, armed and dangerous, holed up in a cathouse.
Forty guys with guns, and you're worrying about your little car?
Look what she's done. We got guns, and Uncle Adam is on his way.
Everybody must be armed and expecting the worst.
- Not to worry. Not to worry. We are now armed with mighty joint.
Haven't you seen the armed guards in town and everywhere? What else do you want?
It's a pity the people in New York don't try and catch a few gunmen... instead of hunting a nice gentleman like you.
You were found in her house, with weapons.
Whoever did this waited until the last minute, and then took out four men armed with machine guns by hand!
There were two against one and armed to the teeth.
Hardly has he entered his compartment, he is attacked by three policemen armed to the teeth.
